# thoughtspot Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "thoughtspot" {
  host           = "team1"
  username       = "username"
  password       = "password"
  org_identifier = "0000"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `host` (String)
- `org_identifier` (String)
- `password` (String)
- `username` (String)
